name: Mini Mech
description:
Hints: Remember you can wall-jump when you are not in the mech! Additionally, remember you can screen wrap not only on the left and right sides, but you can fall through the hole at the bottom to come out the top!

Made solo in about 12 hours for the 2021 GMTK jam with the theme of "Joined Together"

You and your mech need to join together switching between your mobility and the mech's firepower. 

Use "Enter" and the Arrow Keys to navigate menus.

Heavily inspired by Titanfall and Super Crate Box. Try to beat your highscore. All sound, music, code, and art was made during the 48 hour jam period by me except for the font. 

Made in Godot, Art in Piskel, Music in Beepbox, and Sounds in BFXR.
